trans-unit.source: Provides the event data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的事件資料<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Using the capabilities of the Web Parts control set, it is possible to create a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Web 組件控制項集合的功能，就可以建立兩個連接是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他伺服器控制項，做為提供者，而另一個做為資料的取用者的其中一個控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To form a connection, the two controls must reside in a zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control), and they must be designed correctly to share data through a common interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要形成連線，兩個控制項必須在繼承自區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項)，且它們共用通用介面透過資料必須正確地設計。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web 組件連接的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>和[Web 組件連接概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class passes event data to methods that use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> delegate to handle events.
trans-unit.target: WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 類別會將事件資料傳遞至方法，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>來處理事件的委派。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: There are two such connection-related methods that raise events and use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to provide event data.
trans-unit.target: 有兩個這類連線相關的方法來引發事件，並使用 WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 類別來提供事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Both are members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 兩者都是成員的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event after two server controls have successfully connected, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event after two server controls have been disconnected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>方法會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件之後已成功連接兩個伺服器控制項，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A>方法會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件之後已中斷連接兩個伺服器控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Developers can create custom event handler methods for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> events, and in those methods, they can use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to access details of a connection.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以建立自訂事件處理常式方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件，並在這些方法中，它們可以使用 WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 類別存取詳細資料的連接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: For example, a developer can declare the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute on the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assign to it a custom method name that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，開發人員可以宣告`OnWebPartsConnected`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目，並指派其處理事件的自訂方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: In the custom handler method, developers can access the details of a connection by using the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs object that is passed to the method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在自訂處理常式方法中，開發人員可以使用 WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 物件傳遞給方法的參數存取連接的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has two overloads of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 類別有兩個多載建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor is the default; it initializes the property values for the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>建構函式是預設值; 它會初始化類別的屬性值</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor calls the default constructor, and then it also initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>建構函式呼叫預設建構函式，然後它也會初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has several properties, all of which refer to the essential aspects of a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 類別有數個屬性，全部都是指 Web 組件連接的重要層面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property refers to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object that represents the entire connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>屬性參考到關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件，代表整個連線。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control acting as the provider in the connection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>屬性參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或做為提供者在連接中，其他伺服器控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A>屬性參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或做為取用者的伺服器控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> property references the connection's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>屬性參考連接的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>屬性參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"></xref> class without requiring a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"></xref>類別，而不需要<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: It does not require a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 不需要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the values of its properties by assigning each of its connection-related parameter objects to the corresponding property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式會初始化其屬性值，藉由連接相關的參數物件的每個指派給對應的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: 做為提供者的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: 提供者連接點。

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 做為取用者的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: 消費者連接點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化使用指定的類別的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object is available.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式使用時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件可供使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>或做為提供者的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref>連接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>或做為取用者的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref>連接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>目前連接的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object contains all the details of a Web Parts connection, including references to the provider control, the provider's connection point, the consumer control, and the consumer's connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件包含的 Web 組件連接，包括提供者控制、 提供者的連接點，取用者控制項，然後消費者連接點的參考的所有詳細資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web 組件連接的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>，和[Web 組件連接概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制也就是做為取用者在連接中。

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件區域中的控制項之間的連線需要一個控制項，做為提供者，另一個做為取用者。

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 每個控制項也必須擁有連接點定義，連接點必須是在取用者的情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web 組件連接的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>，和[Web 組件連接概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>做為取用者。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref>目前連接的物件。

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件區域中的控制項之間的連線需要一個控制項，做為提供者，另一個做為取用者。

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 每個控制項也必須擁有連接點定義，連接點必須是在取用者的情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web 組件連接的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>，和[Web 組件連接概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref>目前連接。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制也就是做為連接中的提供者。

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件區域中的控制項之間的連線需要一個控制項，做為提供者，另一個做為取用者。

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 每個控制項也必須擁有連接點定義，連接點必須是在提供者的情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web 組件連接的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>，和[Web 組件連接概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>做為提供者。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref>目前連接的物件。

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件區域中的控制項之間的連線需要一個控制項，做為提供者，另一個做為取用者。

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 每個控制項也必須擁有連接點定義，連接點必須是在提供者的情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web 組件連接的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>，和[Web 組件連接概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref>目前連接。
